titles.title: Transparency in Student Loan Consultation Act of 2018
To increase transparency with respect to loan repayment options for Federal student loan borrowers.
Transparency in Student Loan Consultation Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Transparency in Student Loan Consultation Act of 2018
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to provide accurate and complete information about student loan payments to certain borrowers.
